sentences.en: Crack, cold laps and lack of fusion belong to planar discontinuity.
sentences.cn: 属于这种类型的缺陷有裂纹 、 冷隔、末熔合等.

sentences.en: Flange joint system, the location of high stress level geometry discontinuity.
sentences.cn: 法兰接头系统中应力水平较高的位置在几何形状不连续处.

sentences.en: For simplification, it is often neglected when the discontinuity is not severe.
sentences.cn: 一般情况下,这种不连续性不太严重时, 它往往被忽略.

sentences.en: MISMATCH: A discontinuity caused by incorrect mating of tool components.
sentences.cn: 错配: 由错误搭配零件引起的中断.

sentences.en: NICK: Surface discontinuity, a depression or dent caused by impact.
sentences.cn: 刻痕: 表面中断, 由碰撞引起的下陷或凹痕.

sentences.en: One mode is slippage along the discontinuity provided by the lubricated fault plane.
sentences.cn: 其中一种方式是沿着润滑的断层面所形成的间断面而发生滑动.

sentences.en: Simulaneously, the advanced homogenization method and discontinuity factors adopted to improve accuracy.
sentences.cn: 同时在该方法中应用现代均匀化理论,引入不连续因子,以提高计算精度.

sentences.en: SINK: Surface discontinuity, depression or dimple caused by non - uniform material shrinkage.
sentences.cn: 凹槽: 由材料收缩不一致引起的表面中断,下陷,凹洞.

sentences.en: Spline functions are of discontinuity and continuity.
sentences.cn: 样条函数是间段性和连续性的对立统一体.

sentences.en: Such a discontinuity or stress raiser causes a local increase of stress.
sentences.cn: 此类的不连续性或应力集中源会引起应力的局部增加.

sentences.en: The text is good in parts, but suffers from discontinuity.
sentences.cn: 文章分开看还好，但是问题在于不连贯。

sentences.en: Things affect our sense of continuity or discontinuity.
sentences.cn: 我们和事物建立了联系.

sentences.en: We can assume the load dispersion discontinuity lines.
sentences.cn: 我们可以假设荷载分布的突变线.

trans.tran_en: when a process is not continuous
